price: (20) And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent?
arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَالِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: watafaqqada al-ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā arā al-hud'huda am kāna mina al-ghāibīna
